parameters.name: version_date
parameters.description: Release date of the API version in YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.name: utterances
parameters.description: An array of `Utterance` objects that provides the input content that the service is to analyze.

parameters.name: accept_language
parameters.description: The desired language of the response. For two-character arguments, regional variants are treated as their parent language; for example, `en-US` is interpreted as `en`.
